00076 NLDetectorBuilder::E3DetectorDefinition::E3DetectorDefinition(const std::string& id,
00077         OutputDevice& device, SUMOReal haltingSpeedThreshold,
00078         SUMOTime haltingTimeThreshold, int splInterval)
00079     : myID(id), myDevice(device),
00080       myHaltingSpeedThreshold(haltingSpeedThreshold),
00081       myHaltingTimeThreshold(haltingTimeThreshold),
00082       mySampleInterval(splInterval) {}
00083 
00084 
00085 NLDetectorBuilder::E3DetectorDefinition::~E3DetectorDefinition() {}

00097 
00098 void
00099 NLDetectorBuilder::buildInductLoop(const std::string& id,
00100                                    const std::string& lane, SUMOReal pos, int splInterval,
00101                                    OutputDevice& device, bool friendlyPos, bool splitByType) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00102     checkSampleInterval(splInterval, SUMO_TAG_E1DETECTOR, id);
00103     // get and check the lane
00104     MSLane* clane = getLaneChecking(lane, SUMO_TAG_E1DETECTOR, id);
00105 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00106     if (!MSGlobals::gUseMesoSim) {
00107 #endif
00108         // get and check the position
00109         pos = getPositionChecking(pos, clane, friendlyPos, id);
00110         // build the loop
00111         MSDetectorFileOutput* loop = createInductLoop(id, clane, pos, splitByType);
00112         // add the file output
00113         myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_INDUCTION_LOOP, loop, device, splInterval);
00114 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00115     } else {
00116         if (pos < 0) {
00117             pos = clane->getLength() + pos;
00118         }
00119         MESegment* s = MSGlobals::gMesoNet->getSegmentForEdge(clane->getEdge());
00120         MESegment* prev = s;
00121         SUMOReal cpos = 0;
00122         while (cpos + prev->getLength() < pos && s != 0) {
00123             prev = s;
00124             cpos += s->getLength();
00125             s = s->getNextSegment();
00126         }
00127         SUMOReal rpos = pos - cpos; //-prev->getLength();
00128         if (rpos > prev->getLength() || rpos < 0) {
00129             if (friendlyPos) {
00130                 rpos = prev->getLength() - (SUMOReal) 0.1;
00131             } else {
00132                 throw InvalidArgument("The position of detector '" + id + "' lies beyond the lane's '" + lane + "' length.");
00133             }
00134         }
00135         MEInductLoop* loop =
00136             createMEInductLoop(id, prev, rpos);
00137         myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_INDUCTION_LOOP, loop, device, splInterval);
00138     }
00139 #endif
00140 }
00141 
00142 
00143 void
00144 NLDetectorBuilder::buildInstantInductLoop(const std::string& id,
00145         const std::string& lane, SUMOReal pos,
00146         OutputDevice& device, bool friendlyPos) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00147     // get and check the lane
00148     MSLane* clane = getLaneChecking(lane, SUMO_TAG_INSTANT_INDUCTION_LOOP, id);
00149     // get and check the position
00150     pos = getPositionChecking(pos, clane, friendlyPos, id);
00151     // build the loop
00152     MSDetectorFileOutput* loop = createInstantInductLoop(id, clane, pos, device);
00153     // add the file output
00154     myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_INDUCTION_LOOP, loop);
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 void
00159 NLDetectorBuilder::buildE2Detector(const std::string& id,
00160                                    const std::string& lane, SUMOReal pos, SUMOReal length,
00161                                    bool cont, int splInterval,
00162                                    OutputDevice& device,
00163                                    SUMOTime haltingTimeThreshold,
00164                                    SUMOReal haltingSpeedThreshold,
00165                                    SUMOReal jamDistThreshold, bool friendlyPos) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00166     checkSampleInterval(splInterval, SUMO_TAG_E2DETECTOR, id);
00167     MSLane* clane = getLaneChecking(lane, SUMO_TAG_E2DETECTOR, id);
00168     // check whether the detector may lie over more than one lane
00169     MSDetectorFileOutput* det = 0;
00170     if (!cont) {
00171         convUncontE2PosLength(id, clane, pos, length, friendlyPos);
00172         det = buildSingleLaneE2Det(id, DU_USER_DEFINED, clane, pos, length, haltingTimeThreshold, haltingSpeedThreshold, jamDistThreshold);
00173         myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_LANE_AREA_DETECTOR, det, device, splInterval);
00174     } else {
00175         convContE2PosLength(id, clane, pos, length, friendlyPos);
00176         det = buildMultiLaneE2Det(id, DU_USER_DEFINED, clane, pos, length, haltingTimeThreshold, haltingSpeedThreshold, jamDistThreshold);
00177         myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_LANE_AREA_DETECTOR, det, device, splInterval);
00178     }
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 void
00183 NLDetectorBuilder::buildE2Detector(const std::string& id,
00184                                    const std::string& lane, SUMOReal pos, SUMOReal length,
00185                                    bool cont,
00186                                    MSTLLogicControl::TLSLogicVariants& tlls,
00187                                    OutputDevice& device,
00188                                    SUMOTime haltingTimeThreshold,
00189                                    SUMOReal haltingSpeedThreshold,
00190                                    SUMOReal jamDistThreshold, bool friendlyPos) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00191     if (tlls.getActive() == 0) {
00192         throw InvalidArgument("The detector '" + id + "' refers to the unknown lsa.");
00193     }
00194     MSLane* clane = getLaneChecking(lane, SUMO_TAG_E2DETECTOR, id);
00195     // check whether the detector may lie over more than one lane
00196     MSDetectorFileOutput* det = 0;
00197     if (!cont) {
00198         convUncontE2PosLength(id, clane, pos, length, friendlyPos);
00199         det = buildSingleLaneE2Det(id, DU_USER_DEFINED, clane, pos, length, haltingTimeThreshold, haltingSpeedThreshold, jamDistThreshold);
00200         myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_LANE_AREA_DETECTOR, det);
00201     } else {
00202         convContE2PosLength(id, clane, pos, length, friendlyPos);
00203         det = buildMultiLaneE2Det(id, DU_USER_DEFINED, clane, pos, length, haltingTimeThreshold, haltingSpeedThreshold, jamDistThreshold);
00204         myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_LANE_AREA_DETECTOR, det);
00205     }
00206     // add the file output
00207     new Command_SaveTLCoupledDet(tlls, det, myNet.getCurrentTimeStep(), device);
00208 }
00209 
00210 
00211 void
00212 NLDetectorBuilder::buildE2Detector(const std::string& id,
00213                                    const std::string& lane, SUMOReal pos, SUMOReal length,
00214                                    bool cont,
00215                                    MSTLLogicControl::TLSLogicVariants& tlls,
00216                                    const std::string& tolane,
00217                                    OutputDevice& device,
00218                                    SUMOTime haltingTimeThreshold,
00219                                    SUMOReal haltingSpeedThreshold,
00220                                    SUMOReal jamDistThreshold, bool friendlyPos) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00221     if (tlls.getActive() == 0) {
00222         throw InvalidArgument("The detector '" + id + "' refers to the unknown lsa.");
00223     }
00224     MSLane* clane = getLaneChecking(lane, SUMO_TAG_E2DETECTOR, id);
00225     MSLane* ctoLane = getLaneChecking(tolane, SUMO_TAG_E2DETECTOR, id);
00226     MSLink* link = MSLinkContHelper::getConnectingLink(*clane, *ctoLane);
00227     if (link == 0) {
00228         throw InvalidArgument(
00229             "The detector output can not be build as no connection between lanes '"
00230             + lane + "' and '" + tolane + "' exists.");
00231     }
00232     if (pos < 0) {
00233         pos = -pos;
00234     }
00235     // check whether the detector may lie over more than one lane
00236     MSDetectorFileOutput* det = 0;
00237     if (!cont) {
00238         convUncontE2PosLength(id, clane, pos, length, friendlyPos);
00239         det = buildSingleLaneE2Det(id, DU_USER_DEFINED, clane, pos, length, haltingTimeThreshold, haltingSpeedThreshold, jamDistThreshold);
00240         myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_LANE_AREA_DETECTOR, det);
00241     } else {
00242         convContE2PosLength(id, clane, pos, length, friendlyPos);
00243         det = buildMultiLaneE2Det(id, DU_USER_DEFINED, clane, pos, length, haltingTimeThreshold, haltingSpeedThreshold, jamDistThreshold);
00244         myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_LANE_AREA_DETECTOR, det);
00245     }
00246     // add the file output
00247     new Command_SaveTLCoupledLaneDet(tlls, det, myNet.getCurrentTimeStep(), device, link);
00248 }
00249 
00250 
00251 void
00252 NLDetectorBuilder::convUncontE2PosLength(const std::string& id, MSLane* clane,
00253         SUMOReal& pos, SUMOReal& length,
00254         bool friendlyPos) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00255     // get and check the position
00256     pos = getPositionChecking(pos, clane, friendlyPos, id);
00257     // check length
00258     if (length < 0) {
00259         length = clane->getLength() + length;
00260     }
00261     if (length + pos > clane->getLength()) {
00262         if (friendlyPos) {
00263             length = clane->getLength() - pos - (SUMOReal) 0.1;
00264         } else {
00265             throw InvalidArgument("The length of detector '" + id + "' lies beyond the lane's '" + clane->getID() + "' length.");
00266         }
00267     }
00268     if (length < 0) {
00269         if (friendlyPos) {
00270             length = (SUMOReal) 0.1;
00271         } else {
00272             throw InvalidArgument("The length of detector '" + id + "' is almost 0.");
00273         }
00274     }
00275 }
00276 
00277 
00278 void
00279 NLDetectorBuilder::convContE2PosLength(const std::string& id, MSLane* clane,
00280                                        SUMOReal& pos, SUMOReal& /*length*/,
00281                                        bool friendlyPos) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00282     // get and check the position
00283     pos = getPositionChecking(pos, clane, friendlyPos, id);
00284     // length will be kept as is
00285 }

00287 
00288 void
00289 NLDetectorBuilder::beginE3Detector(const std::string& id,
00290                                    OutputDevice& device, int splInterval,
00291                                    SUMOReal haltingSpeedThreshold,
00292                                    SUMOTime haltingTimeThreshold) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00293     checkSampleInterval(splInterval, SUMO_TAG_E3DETECTOR, id);
00294     myE3Definition = new E3DetectorDefinition(id, device, haltingSpeedThreshold, haltingTimeThreshold, splInterval);
00295 }
00296 
00297 
00298 void
00299 NLDetectorBuilder::addE3Entry(const std::string& lane,
00300                               SUMOReal pos, bool friendlyPos) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00301     if (myE3Definition == 0) {
00302         return;
00303     }
00304     MSLane* clane = getLaneChecking(lane, SUMO_TAG_E3DETECTOR, myE3Definition->myID);
00305     // get and check the position
00306     pos = getPositionChecking(pos, clane, friendlyPos, myE3Definition->myID);
00307     // build and save the entry
00308     myE3Definition->myEntries.push_back(MSCrossSection(clane, pos));
00309 }
00310 
00311 
00312 void
00313 NLDetectorBuilder::addE3Exit(const std::string& lane,
00314                              SUMOReal pos, bool friendlyPos) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00315     if (myE3Definition == 0) {
00316         return;
00317     }
00318     MSLane* clane = getLaneChecking(lane, SUMO_TAG_E3DETECTOR, myE3Definition->myID);
00319     // get and check the position
00320     pos = getPositionChecking(pos, clane, friendlyPos, myE3Definition->myID);
00321     // build and save the exit
00322     myE3Definition->myExits.push_back(MSCrossSection(clane, pos));
00323 }
00324 
00325 
00326 std::string
00327 NLDetectorBuilder::getCurrentE3ID() const {
00328     if (myE3Definition == 0) {
00329         return "<unknown>";
00330     }
00331     return myE3Definition->myID;
00332 }
00333 
00334 
00335 void
00336 NLDetectorBuilder::endE3Detector() throw(InvalidArgument) {
00337     if (myE3Definition == 0) {
00338         return;
00339     }
00340     MSDetectorFileOutput* det = createE3Detector(myE3Definition->myID,
00341                                 myE3Definition->myEntries, myE3Definition->myExits,
00342                                 myE3Definition->myHaltingSpeedThreshold, myE3Definition->myHaltingTimeThreshold);
00343     // add to net
00344     myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_ENTRY_EXIT_DETECTOR, det, myE3Definition->myDevice, myE3Definition->mySampleInterval);
00345     // clean up
00346     delete myE3Definition;
00347     myE3Definition = 0;
00348 }

00351 void
00352 NLDetectorBuilder::buildVTypeProbe(const std::string& id,
00353                                    const std::string& vtype, SUMOTime frequency,
00354                                    OutputDevice& device) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00355     checkSampleInterval(frequency, SUMO_TAG_VTYPEPROBE, id);
00356     new MSVTypeProbe(id, vtype, device, frequency);
00357 }

00359 
00360 void
00361 NLDetectorBuilder::buildRouteProbe(const std::string& id, const std::string& edge,
00362                                    SUMOTime frequency, SUMOTime begin,
00363                                    OutputDevice& device) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00364     checkSampleInterval(frequency, SUMO_TAG_ROUTEPROBE, id);
00365     MSEdge* e = getEdgeChecking(edge, SUMO_TAG_ROUTEPROBE, id);
00366     MSRouteProbe* probe = new MSRouteProbe(id, e, begin);
00367     // add the file output
00368     myNet.getDetectorControl().add(SUMO_TAG_ROUTEPROBE, probe, device, frequency, begin);
00369 }

00374 NLDetectorBuilder::buildSingleLaneE2Det(const std::string& id,
00375                                         DetectorUsage usage,
00376                                         MSLane* lane, SUMOReal pos, SUMOReal length,
00377                                         SUMOTime haltingTimeThreshold,

00379                                         SUMOReal jamDistThreshold) {
00380     return createSingleLaneE2Detector(id, usage, lane, pos,
00381                                       length, haltingTimeThreshold, haltingSpeedThreshold,
00382                                       jamDistThreshold);
00383 }

00385 
00386 MSDetectorFileOutput*
00387 NLDetectorBuilder::buildMultiLaneE2Det(const std::string& id, DetectorUsage usage,
00388                                        MSLane* lane, SUMOReal pos, SUMOReal length,
00389                                        SUMOTime haltingTimeThreshold,
00390                                        SUMOReal haltingSpeedThreshold,
00391                                        SUMOReal jamDistThreshold) {
00392     MSDetectorFileOutput* ret = createMultiLaneE2Detector(id, usage,
00393                                 lane, pos, haltingTimeThreshold, haltingSpeedThreshold,
00394                                 jamDistThreshold);
00395     static_cast<MS_E2_ZS_CollectorOverLanes*>(ret)->init(lane, length);
00396     return ret;
00397 }

00447 
00448 
00449 SUMOReal
00450 NLDetectorBuilder::getPositionChecking(SUMOReal pos, MSLane* lane, bool friendlyPos,
00451                                        const std::string& detid) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00452     // check whether it is given from the end
00453     if (pos < 0) {
00454         pos = lane->getLength() + pos;
00455     }
00456     // check whether it is on the lane
00457     if (pos > lane->getLength()) {
00458         if (friendlyPos) {
00459             pos = lane->getLength() - (SUMOReal) 0.1;
00460         } else {
00461             throw InvalidArgument("The position of detector '" + detid + "' lies beyond the lane's '" + lane->getID() + "' length.");
00462         }
00463     }
00464     if (pos < 0) {
00465         if (friendlyPos) {
00466             pos = (SUMOReal) 0.1;
00467         } else {
00468             throw InvalidArgument("The position of detector '" + detid + "' lies beyond the lane's '" + lane->getID() + "' length.");
00469         }
00470     }
00471     return pos;
00472 }
00473 
00474 
00475 void
00476 NLDetectorBuilder::createEdgeLaneMeanData(const std::string& id, SUMOTime frequency,
00477         SUMOTime begin, SUMOTime end, const std::string& type,
00478         const bool useLanes, const bool withEmpty, const bool withInternal, const bool trackVehicles,
00479         const SUMOReal maxTravelTime, const SUMOReal minSamples,
00480         const SUMOReal haltSpeed, const std::string& vTypes,
00481         OutputDevice& device) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00482     if (begin < 0) {
00483         throw InvalidArgument("Negative begin time for meandata dump '" + id + "'.");
00484     }
00485     if (end < 0) {
00486         end = SUMOTime_MAX;
00487     }
00488     if (end <= begin) {
00489         throw InvalidArgument("End before or at begin for meandata dump '" + id + "'.");
00490     }
00491     std::set<std::string> vt;
00492     StringTokenizer st(vTypes);
00493     while (st.hasNext()) {
00494         vt.insert(st.next());
00495     }
00496     MSMeanData* det = 0;
00497     if (type == "" || type == "performance" || type == "traffic") {
00498         det = new MSMeanData_Net(id, begin, end, useLanes, withEmpty, withInternal, trackVehicles,
00499                                  maxTravelTime, minSamples, haltSpeed, vt);
00500     } else if (type == "hbefa") {
00501         det = new MSMeanData_HBEFA(id, begin, end, useLanes, withEmpty, withInternal, trackVehicles,
00502                                    maxTravelTime, minSamples, vt);
00503     } else if (type == "harmonoise") {
00504         det = new MSMeanData_Harmonoise(id, begin, end, useLanes, withEmpty, withInternal, trackVehicles,
00505                                         maxTravelTime, minSamples, vt);
00506     } else {
00507         throw InvalidArgument("Invalid type '" + type + "' for meandata dump '" + id + "'.");
00508     }
00509     if (det != 0) {
00510         if (frequency < 0) {
00511             frequency = end - begin;
00512         }
00513         MSNet::getInstance()->getDetectorControl().add(det, device, frequency, begin);
00514     }
00515 }
00516 
00517 
00518 
00519 
00520 // ------ Value checking/adapting methods ------
00521 MSEdge*
00522 NLDetectorBuilder::getEdgeChecking(const std::string& edgeID, SumoXMLTag type,
00523                                    const std::string& detid) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00524     // get and check the lane
00525     MSEdge* edge = MSEdge::dictionary(edgeID);
00526     if (edge == 0) {
00527         throw InvalidArgument("The lane with the id '" + edgeID + "' is not known (while building " + toString(type) + " '" + detid + "').");
00528     }
00529     return edge;
00530 }
00531 
00532 
00533 MSLane*
00534 NLDetectorBuilder::getLaneChecking(const std::string& laneID, SumoXMLTag type,
00535                                    const std::string& detid) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00536     // get and check the lane
00537     MSLane* lane = MSLane::dictionary(laneID);
00538     if (lane == 0) {
00539         throw InvalidArgument("The lane with the id '" + laneID + "' is not known (while building " + toString(type) + " '" + detid + "').");
00540     }
00541     return lane;
00542 }
00543 
00544 
00545 void
00546 NLDetectorBuilder::checkSampleInterval(int splInterval, SumoXMLTag type, const std::string& id) throw(InvalidArgument) {
00547     if (splInterval < 0) {
00548         throw InvalidArgument("Negative sampling frequency (in " + toString(type) + " '" + id + "').");
00549     }
00550     if (splInterval == 0) {
00551         throw InvalidArgument("Sampling frequency must not be zero (in " + toString(type) + " '" + id + "').");
00552     }
00553 }
00554 
00555
